Rainfall was collected as daily sums from two rainfall gauges in close proximity to the experimental site. The Sabana rainfall gauge was located in an open canopy just outside of the experimental plots. A second rainfall measurement was collected at the Bisley tower weather station located approximately 2 kilometer (km) from the TRACE site. Rainfall was collected using a 10 cm plastic funnel draining into a 180 milliliter (ml) plastic bottle. More information on Sabana and Bisley MET station measurements are provided in González (2017)
